rules.label: array-callback-return
rules.comment: Enforce return statements in callbacks of array methods

rules.label: constructor-super
rules.comment: Require `super()` calls in constructors

rules.label: for-direction
rules.comment: Enforce "for" loop update clause moving the counter in the right direction

rules.label: getter-return
rules.comment: Enforce `return` statements in getters

rules.label: no-async-promise-executor
rules.comment: Disallow using an async function as a Promise executor

rules.label: no-await-in-loop
rules.comment: Disallow `await` inside of loops

rules.label: no-class-assign
rules.comment: Disallow reassigning class members

rules.label: no-compare-neg-zero
rules.comment: Disallow comparing against -0

rules.label: no-cond-assign
rules.comment: Disallow assignment operators in conditional expressions

rules.label: no-const-assign
rules.comment: Disallow reassigning `const` variables

rules.label: no-constant-binary-expression
rules.comment: Disallow expressions where the operation doesn't affect the value

rules.label: no-constant-condition
rules.comment: Disallow constant expressions in conditions

rules.label: no-constructor-return
rules.comment: Disallow returning value from constructor

rules.label: no-control-regex
rules.comment: Disallow control characters in regular expressions

rules.label: no-debugger
rules.comment: Disallow the use of `debugger`

rules.label: no-dupe-args
rules.comment: Disallow duplicate arguments in `function` definitions

rules.label: no-dupe-class-members
rules.comment: Disallow duplicate class members

rules.label: no-dupe-else-if
rules.comment: Disallow duplicate conditions in if-else-if chains

rules.label: no-dupe-keys
rules.comment: Disallow duplicate keys in object literals

rules.label: no-duplicate-case
rules.comment: Disallow duplicate case labels

rules.label: no-duplicate-imports
rules.comment: Disallow duplicate module imports

rules.label: no-empty-character-class
rules.comment: Disallow empty character classes in regular expressions

rules.label: no-empty-pattern
rules.comment: Disallow empty destructuring patterns

rules.label: no-ex-assign
rules.comment: Disallow reassigning exceptions in `catch` clauses

rules.label: no-fallthrough
rules.comment: Disallow fallthrough of `case` statements

rules.label: no-func-assign
rules.comment: Disallow reassigning `function` declarations

rules.label: no-import-assign
rules.comment: Disallow assigning to imported bindings

rules.label: no-inner-declarations
rules.comment: Disallow variable or `function` declarations in nested blocks

rules.label: no-invalid-regexp
rules.comment: Disallow invalid regular expression strings in `RegExp` constructors

rules.label: no-irregular-whitespace
rules.comment: Disallow irregular whitespace

rules.label: no-loss-of-precision
rules.comment: Disallow literal numbers that lose precision

rules.label: no-misleading-character-class
rules.comment: Disallow characters which are made with multiple code points in character class syntax

rules.label: no-new-native-nonconstructor
rules.comment: Disallow `new` operators with global non-constructor functions

rules.label: no-new-symbol
rules.comment: Disallow `new` operators with the `Symbol` object

rules.label: no-obj-calls
rules.comment: Disallow calling global object properties as functions

rules.label: no-promise-executor-return
rules.comment: Disallow returning values from Promise executor functions

rules.label: no-prototype-builtins
rules.comment: Disallow calling some `Object.prototype` methods directly on objects

rules.label: no-self-assign
rules.comment: Disallow assignments where both sides are exactly the same

rules.label: no-self-compare
rules.comment: Disallow comparisons where both sides are exactly the same

rules.label: no-setter-return
rules.comment: Disallow returning values from setters

rules.label: no-sparse-arrays
rules.comment: Disallow sparse arrays

rules.label: no-template-curly-in-string
rules.comment: Disallow template literal placeholder syntax in regular strings

rules.label: no-this-before-super
rules.comment: Disallow `this`/`super` before calling `super()` in constructors

rules.label: no-undef
rules.comment: Disallow the use of undeclared variables unless mentioned in `/*global */` comments

rules.label: no-unexpected-multiline
rules.comment: Disallow confusing multiline expressions

rules.label: no-unmodified-loop-condition
rules.comment: Disallow unmodified loop conditions

rules.label: no-unreachable
rules.comment: Disallow unreachable code after `return`, `throw`, `continue`, and `break` statements

rules.label: no-unreachable-loop
rules.comment: Disallow loops with a body that allows only one iteration

rules.label: no-unsafe-finally
rules.comment: Disallow control flow statements in `finally` blocks

rules.label: no-unsafe-negation
rules.comment: Disallow negating the left operand of relational operators

rules.label: no-unsafe-optional-chaining
rules.comment: Disallow use of optional chaining in contexts where the `undefined` value is not allowed

rules.label: no-unused-private-class-members
rules.comment: Disallow unused private class members

rules.label: no-unused-vars
rules.comment: Disallow unused variables

rules.label: no-use-before-define
rules.comment: Disallow the use of variables before they are defined

rules.label: no-useless-backreference
rules.comment: Disallow useless backreferences in regular expressions

rules.label: require-atomic-updates
rules.comment: Disallow assignments that can lead to race conditions due to usage of `await` or `yield`

rules.label: use-isnan
rules.comment: Require calls to `isNaN()` when checking for `NaN`

rules.label: valid-typeof
rules.comment: Enforce comparing `typeof` expressions against valid strings

rules.label: accessor-pairs
rules.comment: Enforce getter and setter pairs in objects and classes

rules.label: arrow-body-style
rules.comment: Require braces around arrow function bodies

rules.label: block-scoped-var
rules.comment: Enforce the use of variables within the scope they are defined

rules.label: camelcase
rules.comment: Enforce camelcase naming convention

rules.label: capitalized-comments
rules.comment: Enforce or disallow capitalization of the first letter of a comment

rules.label: class-methods-use-this
rules.comment: Enforce that class methods utilize `this`

rules.label: complexity
rules.comment: Enforce a maximum cyclomatic complexity allowed in a program

rules.label: consistent-return
rules.comment: Require `return` statements to either always or never specify values

rules.label: consistent-this
rules.comment: Enforce consistent naming when capturing the current execution context

rules.label: curly
rules.comment: Enforce consistent brace style for all control statements

rules.label: default-case
rules.comment: Require `default` cases in `switch` statements

rules.label: default-case-last
rules.comment: Enforce default clauses in switch statements to be last

rules.label: default-param-last
rules.comment: Enforce default parameters to be last

rules.label: dot-notation
rules.comment: Enforce dot notation whenever possible

rules.label: eqeqeq
rules.comment: Require the use of `===` and `!==`

rules.label: func-name-matching
rules.comment: Require function names to match the name of the variable or property to which they are assigned

rules.label: func-names
rules.comment: Require or disallow named `function` expressions

rules.label: func-style
rules.comment: Enforce the consistent use of either `function` declarations or expressions

rules.label: grouped-accessor-pairs
rules.comment: Require grouped accessor pairs in object literals and classes

rules.label: guard-for-in
rules.comment: Require `for-in` loops to include an `if` statement

rules.label: id-denylist
rules.comment: Disallow specified identifiers

rules.label: id-length
rules.comment: Enforce minimum and maximum identifier lengths

rules.label: id-match
rules.comment: Require identifiers to match a specified regular expression

rules.label: init-declarations
rules.comment: Require or disallow initialization in variable declarations

rules.label: logical-assignment-operators
rules.comment: Require or disallow logical assignment logical operator shorthand

rules.label: max-classes-per-file
rules.comment: Enforce a maximum number of classes per file

rules.label: max-depth
rules.comment: Enforce a maximum depth that blocks can be nested

rules.label: max-lines
rules.comment: Enforce a maximum number of lines per file

rules.label: max-lines-per-function
rules.comment: Enforce a maximum number of lines of code in a function

rules.label: max-nested-callbacks
rules.comment: Enforce a maximum depth that callbacks can be nested

rules.label: max-params
rules.comment: Enforce a maximum number of parameters in function definitions

rules.label: max-statements
rules.comment: Enforce a maximum number of statements allowed in function blocks

rules.label: multiline-comment-style
rules.comment: Enforce a particular style for multiline comments

rules.label: new-cap
rules.comment: Require constructor names to begin with a capital letter

rules.label: no-alert
rules.comment: Disallow the use of `alert`, `confirm`, and `prompt`

rules.label: no-array-constructor
rules.comment: Disallow `Array` constructors

rules.label: no-bitwise
rules.comment: Disallow bitwise operators

rules.label: no-caller
rules.comment: Disallow the use of `arguments.caller` or `arguments.callee`

rules.label: no-case-declarations
rules.comment: Disallow lexical declarations in case clauses

rules.label: no-confusing-arrow
rules.comment: Disallow arrow functions where they could be confused with comparisons

rules.label: no-console
rules.comment: Disallow the use of `console`

rules.label: no-continue
rules.comment: Disallow `continue` statements

rules.label: no-delete-var
rules.comment: Disallow deleting variables

rules.label: no-div-regex
rules.comment: Disallow division operators explicitly at the beginning of regular expressions

rules.label: no-else-return
rules.comment: Disallow `else` blocks after `return` statements in `if` statements

rules.label: no-empty
rules.comment: Disallow empty block statements

rules.label: no-empty-function
rules.comment: Disallow empty functions

rules.label: no-empty-static-block
rules.comment: Disallow empty static blocks

rules.label: no-eq-null
rules.comment: Disallow `null` comparisons without type-checking operators

rules.label: no-eval
rules.comment: Disallow the use of `eval()`

rules.label: no-extend-native
rules.comment: Disallow extending native types

rules.label: no-extra-bind
rules.comment: Disallow unnecessary calls to `.bind()`

rules.label: no-extra-boolean-cast
rules.comment: Disallow unnecessary boolean casts

rules.label: no-extra-label
rules.comment: Disallow unnecessary labels

rules.label: no-extra-semi
rules.comment: Disallow unnecessary semicolons

rules.label: no-floating-decimal
rules.comment: Disallow leading or trailing decimal points in numeric literals

rules.label: no-global-assign
rules.comment: Disallow assignments to native objects or read-only global variables

rules.label: no-implicit-coercion
rules.comment: Disallow shorthand type conversions

rules.label: no-implicit-globals
rules.comment: Disallow declarations in the global scope

rules.label: no-implied-eval
rules.comment: Disallow the use of `eval()`-like methods

rules.label: no-inline-comments
rules.comment: Disallow inline comments after code

rules.label: no-invalid-this
rules.comment: Disallow use of `this` in contexts where the value of `this` is `undefined`

rules.label: no-iterator
rules.comment: Disallow the use of the `__iterator__` property

rules.label: no-label-var
rules.comment: Disallow labels that share a name with a variable

rules.label: no-labels
rules.comment: Disallow labeled statements

rules.label: no-lone-blocks
rules.comment: Disallow unnecessary nested blocks

rules.label: no-lonely-if
rules.comment: Disallow `if` statements as the only statement in `else` blocks

rules.label: no-loop-func
rules.comment: Disallow function declarations that contain unsafe references inside loop statements

rules.label: no-magic-numbers
rules.comment: Disallow magic numbers

rules.label: no-mixed-operators
rules.comment: Disallow mixed binary operators

rules.label: no-multi-assign
rules.comment: Disallow use of chained assignment expressions

rules.label: no-multi-str
rules.comment: Disallow multiline strings

rules.label: no-negated-condition
rules.comment: Disallow negated conditions

rules.label: no-nested-ternary
rules.comment: Disallow nested ternary expressions

rules.label: no-new
rules.comment: Disallow `new` operators outside of assignments or comparisons

rules.label: no-new-func
rules.comment: Disallow `new` operators with the `Function` object

rules.label: no-new-object
rules.comment: Disallow `Object` constructors

rules.label: no-new-wrappers
rules.comment: Disallow `new` operators with the `String`, `Number`, and `Boolean` objects

rules.label: no-nonoctal-decimal-escape
rules.comment: Disallow `\8` and `\9` escape sequences in string literals

rules.label: no-octal
rules.comment: Disallow octal literals

rules.label: no-octal-escape
rules.comment: Disallow octal escape sequences in string literals

rules.label: no-param-reassign
rules.comment: Disallow reassigning `function` parameters

rules.label: no-plusplus
rules.comment: Disallow the unary operators `++` and `--`

rules.label: no-proto
rules.comment: Disallow the use of the `__proto__` property

rules.label: no-redeclare
rules.comment: Disallow variable redeclaration

rules.label: no-regex-spaces
rules.comment: Disallow multiple spaces in regular expressions

rules.label: no-restricted-exports
rules.comment: Disallow specified names in exports

rules.label: no-restricted-globals
rules.comment: Disallow specified global variables

rules.label: no-restricted-imports
rules.comment: Disallow specified modules when loaded by `import`

rules.label: no-restricted-properties
rules.comment: Disallow certain properties on certain objects

rules.label: no-restricted-syntax
rules.comment: Disallow specified syntax

rules.label: no-return-assign
rules.comment: Disallow assignment operators in `return` statements

rules.label: no-return-await
rules.comment: Disallow unnecessary `return await`

rules.label: no-script-url
rules.comment: Disallow `javascript:` urls

rules.label: no-sequences
rules.comment: Disallow comma operators

rules.label: no-shadow
rules.comment: Disallow variable declarations from shadowing variables declared in the outer scope

rules.label: no-shadow-restricted-names
rules.comment: Disallow identifiers from shadowing restricted names

rules.label: no-ternary
rules.comment: Disallow ternary operators

rules.label: no-throw-literal
rules.comment: Disallow throwing literals as exceptions

rules.label: no-undef-init
rules.comment: Disallow initializing variables to `undefined`

rules.label: no-undefined
rules.comment: Disallow the use of `undefined` as an identifier

rules.label: no-underscore-dangle
rules.comment: Disallow dangling underscores in identifiers

rules.label: no-unneeded-ternary
rules.comment: Disallow ternary operators when simpler alternatives exist

rules.label: no-unused-expressions
rules.comment: Disallow unused expressions

rules.label: no-unused-labels
rules.comment: Disallow unused labels

rules.label: no-useless-call
rules.comment: Disallow unnecessary calls to `.call()` and `.apply()`

rules.label: no-useless-catch
rules.comment: Disallow unnecessary `catch` clauses

rules.label: no-useless-computed-key
rules.comment: Disallow unnecessary computed property keys in objects and classes

rules.label: no-useless-concat
rules.comment: Disallow unnecessary concatenation of literals or template literals

rules.label: no-useless-constructor
rules.comment: Disallow unnecessary constructors

rules.label: no-useless-escape
rules.comment: Disallow unnecessary escape characters

rules.label: no-useless-rename
rules.comment: Disallow renaming import, export, and destructured assignments to the same name

rules.label: no-useless-return
rules.comment: Disallow redundant return statements

rules.label: no-var
rules.comment: Require `let` or `const` instead of `var`

rules.label: no-void
rules.comment: Disallow `void` operators

rules.label: no-warning-comments
rules.comment: Disallow specified warning terms in comments

rules.label: no-with
rules.comment: Disallow `with` statements

rules.label: object-shorthand
rules.comment: Require or disallow method and property shorthand syntax for object literals

rules.label: one-var
rules.comment: Enforce variables to be declared either together or separately in functions

rules.label: one-var-declaration-per-line
rules.comment: Require or disallow newlines around variable declarations

rules.label: operator-assignment
rules.comment: Require or disallow assignment operator shorthand where possible

rules.label: prefer-arrow-callback
rules.comment: Require using arrow functions for callbacks

rules.label: prefer-const
rules.comment: Require `const` declarations for variables that are never reassigned after declared

rules.label: prefer-destructuring
rules.comment: Require destructuring from arrays and/or objects

rules.label: prefer-exponentiation-operator
rules.comment: Disallow the use of `Math.pow` in favor of the `**` operator

rules.label: prefer-named-capture-group
rules.comment: Enforce using named capture group in regular expression

rules.label: prefer-numeric-literals
rules.comment: Disallow `parseInt()` and `Number.parseInt()` in favor of binary, octal, and hexadecimal literals

rules.label: prefer-object-has-own
rules.comment: Disallow use of `Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call()` and prefer use of `Object.hasOwn()`

rules.label: prefer-object-spread
rules.comment: Disallow using Object.assign with an object literal as the first argument and prefer the use of object spread instead

rules.label: prefer-promise-reject-errors
rules.comment: Require using Error objects as Promise rejection reasons

rules.label: prefer-regex-literals
rules.comment: Disallow use of the `RegExp` constructor in favor of regular expression literals

rules.label: prefer-rest-params
rules.comment: Require rest parameters instead of `arguments`

rules.label: prefer-spread
rules.comment: Require spread operators instead of `.apply()`

rules.label: prefer-template
rules.comment: Require template literals instead of string concatenation

rules.label: quote-props
rules.comment: Require quotes around object literal property names

rules.label: radix
rules.comment: Enforce the consistent use of the radix argument when using `parseInt()`

rules.label: require-await
rules.comment: Disallow async functions which have no `await` expression

rules.label: require-unicode-regexp
rules.comment: Enforce the use of `u` flag on RegExp

rules.label: require-yield
rules.comment: Require generator functions to contain `yield`

rules.label: sort-imports
rules.comment: Enforce sorted import declarations within modules

rules.label: sort-keys
rules.comment: Require object keys to be sorted

rules.label: sort-vars
rules.comment: Require variables within the same declaration block to be sorted

rules.label: spaced-comment
rules.comment: Enforce consistent spacing after the `//` or `/*` in a comment

rules.label: strict
rules.comment: Require or disallow strict mode directives

rules.label: symbol-description
rules.comment: Require symbol descriptions

rules.label: vars-on-top
rules.comment: Require `var` declarations be placed at the top of their containing scope

rules.label: yoda
rules.comment: Require or disallow "Yoda" conditions

rules.label: array-bracket-newline
rules.comment: Enforce linebreaks after opening and before closing array brackets

rules.label: array-bracket-spacing
rules.comment: Enforce consistent spacing inside array brackets

rules.label: array-element-newline
rules.comment: Enforce line breaks after each array element

rules.label: arrow-parens
rules.comment: Require parentheses around arrow function arguments

rules.label: arrow-spacing
rules.comment: Enforce consistent spacing before and after the arrow in arrow functions

rules.label: block-spacing
rules.comment: Disallow or enforce spaces inside of blocks after opening block and before closing block

rules.label: brace-style
rules.comment: Enforce consistent brace style for blocks

rules.label: comma-dangle
rules.comment: Require or disallow trailing commas

rules.label: comma-spacing
rules.comment: Enforce consistent spacing before and after commas

rules.label: comma-style
rules.comment: Enforce consistent comma style

rules.label: computed-property-spacing
rules.comment: Enforce consistent spacing inside computed property brackets

rules.label: dot-location
rules.comment: Enforce consistent newlines before and after dots

rules.label: eol-last
rules.comment: Require or disallow newline at the end of files

rules.label: func-call-spacing
rules.comment: Require or disallow spacing between function identifiers and their invocations

rules.label: function-call-argument-newline
rules.comment: Enforce line breaks between arguments of a function call

rules.label: function-paren-newline
rules.comment: Enforce consistent line breaks inside function parentheses

rules.label: generator-star-spacing
rules.comment: Enforce consistent spacing around `*` operators in generator functions

rules.label: implicit-arrow-linebreak
rules.comment: Enforce the location of arrow function bodies

rules.label: indent
rules.comment: Enforce consistent indentation

rules.label: jsx-quotes
rules.comment: Enforce the consistent use of either double or single quotes in JSX attributes

rules.label: key-spacing
rules.comment: Enforce consistent spacing between keys and values in object literal properties

rules.label: keyword-spacing
rules.comment: Enforce consistent spacing before and after keywords

rules.label: line-comment-position
rules.comment: Enforce position of line comments

rules.label: linebreak-style
rules.comment: Enforce consistent linebreak style

rules.label: lines-around-comment
rules.comment: Require empty lines around comments

rules.label: lines-between-class-members
rules.comment: Require or disallow an empty line between class members

rules.label: max-len
rules.comment: Enforce a maximum line length

rules.label: max-statements-per-line
rules.comment: Enforce a maximum number of statements allowed per line

rules.label: multiline-ternary
rules.comment: Enforce newlines between operands of ternary expressions

rules.label: new-parens
rules.comment: Enforce or disallow parentheses when invoking a constructor with no arguments

rules.label: newline-per-chained-call
rules.comment: Require a newline after each call in a method chain

rules.label: no-extra-parens
rules.comment: Disallow unnecessary parentheses

rules.label: no-mixed-spaces-and-tabs
rules.comment: Disallow mixed spaces and tabs for indentation

rules.label: no-multi-spaces
rules.comment: Disallow multiple spaces

rules.label: no-multiple-empty-lines
rules.comment: Disallow multiple empty lines

rules.label: no-tabs
rules.comment: Disallow all tabs

rules.label: no-trailing-spaces
rules.comment: Disallow trailing whitespace at the end of lines

rules.label: no-whitespace-before-property
rules.comment: Disallow whitespace before properties

rules.label: nonblock-statement-body-position
rules.comment: Enforce the location of single-line statements

rules.label: object-curly-newline
rules.comment: Enforce consistent line breaks after opening and before closing braces

rules.label: object-curly-spacing
rules.comment: Enforce consistent spacing inside braces

rules.label: object-property-newline
rules.comment: Enforce placing object properties on separate lines

rules.label: operator-linebreak
rules.comment: Enforce consistent linebreak style for operators

rules.label: padded-blocks
rules.comment: Require or disallow padding within blocks

rules.label: padding-line-between-statements
rules.comment: Require or disallow padding lines between statements

rules.label: quotes
rules.comment: Enforce the consistent use of either backticks, double, or single quotes

rules.label: rest-spread-spacing
rules.comment: Enforce spacing between rest and spread operators and their expressions

rules.label: semi
rules.comment: Require or disallow semicolons instead of ASI

rules.label: semi-spacing
rules.comment: Enforce consistent spacing before and after semicolons

rules.label: semi-style
rules.comment: Enforce location of semicolons

rules.label: space-before-blocks
rules.comment: Enforce consistent spacing before blocks

rules.label: space-before-function-paren
rules.comment: Enforce consistent spacing before `function` definition opening parenthesis

rules.label: space-in-parens
rules.comment: Enforce consistent spacing inside parentheses

rules.label: space-infix-ops
rules.comment: Require spacing around infix operators

rules.label: space-unary-ops
rules.comment: Enforce consistent spacing before or after unary operators

rules.label: switch-colon-spacing
rules.comment: Enforce spacing around colons of switch statements

rules.label: template-curly-spacing
rules.comment: Require or disallow spacing around embedded expressions of template strings

rules.label: template-tag-spacing
rules.comment: Require or disallow spacing between template tags and their literals

rules.label: unicode-bom
rules.comment: Require or disallow Unicode byte order mark (BOM)

rules.label: wrap-iife
rules.comment: Require parentheses around immediate `function` invocations

rules.label: wrap-regex
rules.comment: Require parenthesis around regex literals

rules.label: yield-star-spacing
rules.comment: Require or disallow spacing around the `*` in `yield*` expressions
